name: QuasAR Arena
description: QuasAR Arena is the latest from Augmented Reality experts HappyGiant. QuasAR Arena allows for incredibly fast pairing between players, and then is a PvP laser tag-like battle game for 2 players, using shields and projectiles. This game is FREE with no In App Purchases or Ads! We hope to add new modes to it soon, and we would love any feedback. Please email us at info@happygiant.com. Post pics and videos online and share on Twitter and follow us at @happygiantar. Thanks for playing the bleeding edge of AR tech!
